Name: Template: Side Dungeon Kill Unique
Phase0Description: Big Summungus can be found in the Quest Template Side Dungeon. He will appear whenever any player who needs to kill him for this quest approaches his spawner. He can spawn repeatedly within the same instance, if needed. He does not drop loot. He is very big.
Phase14Description: I have rid the world of Big Summungus. He was, in fact, quite big. I should return to Eddie in Quest Template World 03.
Toast: Kill a unique elite in a side dungeon.
